description: 2 pts. in 1 vol.-I.: ff. 219. 303 x 207; 188 x 95 mm. 20 lin. II.: ff. 125. 303 x 207; 200 x 117 mm. 31 lin. 16th/17th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 476 (commentary a); S I, 657; the anon. ms. Garrett 1714 (= Brockelmann, GAL, I, 476, commentary c) also contains this commentary.
